name: Aunt Nora's Mock Lobster
keywords: ground beef, ground pork, ground veal, main course, winter
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds mixed ground beef, veal and pork

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, combine everything but the bacon. Mix, using your hands, until well blended. In a roasting pan or iron skillet, shape the mixture into a lobster. With the ketchup, either rub a thin coating all over the lobster or make lines for visual appeal. Wrap the bacon slices across the tail or at joints, so everyone gets a little. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes, covering the "claws" with foil after 40 minutes so that they don't dry out.
